data.name: AdoDotNetConnectionProperties_NoProperties
data.value: No connection properties have been set.

data.name: AuthenticationFailedErrorMessage
data.value: An error occurred while authenticating the user

data.name: AzureServerNotFound
data.value: The server you specified {0} does not exist in any subscription in {1}. Either you have signed in with an incorrect account or your server was removed from subscription(s) in this account. Please check your account and try again.

data.name: AzureSubscriptionFailedErrorMessage
data.value: An error occurred while getting Azure subscriptions

data.name: DatabaseDiscoveryFailedErrorMessage
data.value: An error occurred while getting databases from servers of type {0} from {1}

data.name: ErrUnexpectedConnectionType
data.value: Unexpected connection type.

data.name: FailedToGetAzureDatabasesErrorMessage
data.value: An error occurred while getting Azure databases

data.name: FailedToGetAzureResourceGroupsErrorMessage
data.value: An error occurred while getting Azure resource groups

data.name: FailedToGetAzureSqlServersErrorMessage
data.value: An error occurred while getting Azure Sql Servers

data.name: FirewallRuleAccessForbidden
data.value: {0} does not have permission to change the server firewall rule. Try again with a different account that is an Owner or Contributor of the Azure subscription or the server.

data.name: FirewallRuleCreationFailed
data.value: An error occurred while creating a new firewall rule.

data.name: InvalidIpAddress
data.value: Invalid IP address

data.name: InvalidServerTypeErrorMessage
data.value: Server Type is invalid.

data.name: LoadingExportableFailedGeneralErrorMessage
data.value: A required dll cannot be loaded. Please repair your application.

data.name: NoInternetConnectionError
data.value: No internet connection found

data.name: ServerDiscoveryFailedErrorMessage
data.value: An error occurred while getting server of type {0} from {1}

data.name: SqlConnectionProperties_CannotTestNonExistentDatabase
data.value: This connection cannot be tested because the specified database does not exist or is not visible to the specified user.

data.name: SqlConnectionProperties_MustSpecifyDataSource
data.value: This connection cannot be tested because no server name has been specified.

data.name: SqlConnectionProperties_UnsupportedSqlVersion
data.value: This server version is not supported. You must have Microsoft SQL Server 2005 or later.

data.name: SqlFileConnectionProperties_CannotTestNonExistentMdf
data.value: This connection cannot be tested because the specified database file does not exist.

data.name: SqlFileConnectionProperties_NoFileSpecified
data.value: No database file was specified.

data.name: SqlFileConnectionProperties_TimeoutReasons
data.value: Common reasons for this problem include that the server is not installed, the service is not started or the server is upgrading your database. If an upgrade is in process, you will be able to connect to the database when the upgrade is complete.

data.name: UnsupportedSqlServerVersionErrorMessage
data.value: Sql Server Version is not supported.
